```{r, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(kableExtra)
```

This blogpost collects `R` packages that are useful for causal inference in the social sciences, particularly political science. This table is not exhaustive and merely serves as a useful references for students and applied researchers. 

```{r, echo=FALSE}
packages <- readxl::read_xlsx("./useful_r_packages.xlsx")
kable(packages) %>%
  kable_styling(bootstrap_options = c("striped", "hover", "condensed", "responsive"))
```
